positive: I crave the stickiness of desire.
negative: I need it on my skin...
I need them to paint on me!
I crave more to cover my skin.
Give me more to decorate with.
Razzmatazz.description: Because you love the warm embrace of cum on your skin you gain the tint of razzmatazz. You gain 50 max health, and having cum on your skin increases your confidence which increases your two-handed damage. If you haven't had cum on your skin in a day, you can no longer talk to people who do not produce cum.

positive: Feeling your power course through my veins.
A river of desire flows through me.
Feeling so full of your passion.
Cupid.description: You colour is cum-addiction cupid! If you embrace this color of your desire, you gain immunity to diseases and poisons. You also have increased max magicka based on how filled up you are. But if you have no cum inside you, you take double damage from ice and fire.

positive: Breaking trust, one partner at a time.
A secret only I can keep.
The more heartbroken, the happier I am.
The betrayal adds spice to our passion.
Making them suffer only heightens the experience.
My energy soars on the wings of a heartbreak.
Lavenderblush.description: You long for the destruction of trus, so your new tint is Lavenderblush! Having sex for the first time with a person in a marriage that does not involve you increases your XP gained by a lot. As this upsets her greatly, Mara forbids you from wearing her amulet.

positive: Our kisses ignite a fiery passion.
This love story is the tale of our time.
Our love grows with each touch.
I am complete in your arms.
negative: Without romance, it's just an encounter.
My essence craves for true affection.
A missed chance to declare devotion.
Wishing for soft whispers of love.
Carnation.description: You love love! So your color is carnation. As love conquers all, you gain increased damage against creatures incapable of love such as monsters, but you lose damage against humans if you haven't had a romantic interaction in a while.

positive: Unbridled passion in its purest form.
Tosca.description: You're gay, good for you! Your color is tosca, which triples xp from interactions with your gender, but halves it in other cases.

Blush.description: You love to the feel of arousal, you color is blush, on your face and your desire. You are permanently maximally aroused if you are not satiated. Friendly people who get you off, gain a strong buff to all their stats.

Lilac.description: COLOR. While you are collared, you halve the time between your barks and halve your effectiveness to intimidate people. If you take of your collar, you lose 50% energy and are sad for a day.

positive: I love feeling naughty with someone new.
The first time always leaves a lasting impression.
First times are the most thrilling.
Your first time with me is unforgettable.
negative: Move along, nothing new to see here.
Are you sure we haven't already done this?
Isn't it time for something new?
Pink.description: Your color is pink, like the inside of your body. You become exhibitionistic and gain 50 stamina. While you are top and bottomless you gain increased armor. But if you put on clothes again, your speed decreases.

Maroon.description: Maroon is the new black! You start each day with a new tattoo, these make you more intriguing, increasing your speech by 10.

Pink2.description: Oh oh, you are now a bimbo! You can no longer become satiated, but you also can no longer fall below 0 energy. This color is so strong, it removes all of your other colors.

Crusta.description: Your color is crusta! Sneaking no longer costs energy, but you can only regain energy indoors or at night.

Sangria.description: You favourite color is sangria. You gain 20% ice resistance and when you consume alcohol, you gain 50 max stamina for a while. If you haven't had a drink in a while, you find something to drink which costs a lot more than usual.

Mystic.description: You love swalloing mystical things. Your potions and poisons are 10% stronger and while you are digesting cum or have eaten an ingredient or drank a potion recently, you increase your chance of picking an additional ingredient by 10%. Professional alchemists dislike you and charge you 20% worse prices.

Geraldine.description: Your ass is geraldine colored like from all that spanking! You have increased max health due to getting used to the pain. When you get your ass spanked, you learn faster for a while. If your ass is unspanked for to long, it makes a loud noise when you start sneaking.

Crimson.description: You are addicted to seeing your own crimson colored blood. You double the bonus max health from the body skill and add your base skill level on top. If you are above 200 current health, you take double damage from all sources. This penalty increases to triples or sextuples, if you haven't been below 200 health or spanked/bitten in a while.

Cerise.description: COLOR. You restoration skill increases 20% faster. They also cost twice as much. If you have been praised recently, they also heal twice as much.

Plum.description: You are bad with money like a plum. Selling prices are reduced to a quarter. This has made you more aware of the world around you, increasing your learning rate by 100%. If you recently had sex with a shopkeep, you reduce their prices by half of your seduction level.

Pompadour.description: Wearing revealing clothing make your illusion and destruction spells more potent based on your seduction level. Being in combat less revealing clothes makes them weaker.

Tolopea.description: Your enchantments are 10% stronger. If you had a hypnosis session or masturbated while fantasizing about it recently, you learn magic skills 20% faster. This buff refreshes automatically.

positive: The warmth of your love fills me with power.
Your embrace makes the world fade away.
Together, we reach new heights of passion and intimacy.
With each touch, our bond grows stronger.
I can feel the fire of our passion igniting within us.
In your arms, I am free to be my most powerful self.
My heart swells with desire for you.
This passion is pure and true.
My flame burns brighter for your touch.
I feel complete when we are one.
The love between us, a beacon of light.
This connection is beyond all physical needs.
negative: My soul aches for genuine affection.
The void within me grows with every shallow encounter.
This lust is but a hollow echo.
The taste of passion is bittersweet without love.
I yearn for a heart to call my own.
My heart aches, the emptiness is overwhelming.
This pain cuts deeper than any sword.
Lost in the void of separation.
Without them, my essence fades away.
Alone, I am but a flickering ember.
Scarlet.description: If you choose Scarlet, you can only gain energy from people that like you. Feeding on them grants you strong temporary buffs. You can also enthrall people who would die for you.

positive: Breaking rules is part of the fun.
Life is all about taking risks.
The more dangerous, the more exhilarating.
negative: My heart longs for a wilder beat.
Mahogany.description: If you choose Mahogany, you can gain energy from hostile people, but you can no longer get energy from wholesome activities.
